name: BOTTOMLESS (NOX)
description:
For the two of you seeing this, this is an offensively short prototype made by two graphic designers in a week! We aren't any "Horror Game Ps1 Asthetic" wannabes, don't expect much, we did this for fun.

Average playtime: LITERALLY less than 1 minute if you have half a brain.

Controls:

  • W A S D to move
  • F to interact
